categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: In 3643 BBY, Serjil Javis and his brother Vargai encountered a Sith apprentice in Imperial space and a dispute broke out. The Sith killed Serjil and crippled Vargai, and the incident disrupted an Imperial Intelligence operation involving Karrels Javis.
The Sith apprentice is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Imperial Agent class mission on the planet Hutta.
